summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Job Board application with Node.js + Express backend and React frontend. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with minor modal interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts clicks preventing proper cancel button testing
ui_bugs.selector: Modal overlay div with z-50 bg-black/80

integration_issues.issue: New job may not appear at top of list immediately after submission

passed_tests: Frontend page loading and component display
Search functionality by title and company
Category filtering (All, Design, Development, Marketing, Sales, Support, Other)
Job posting form opens and fields can be filled
Responsive design on mobile (390px), tablet (768px), desktop (1920px)
Footer contact information and links display
Job cards display with proper structure
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in PostJobForm component to prevent click interception. Consider adding force=true to modal interactions or adjusting z-index/overlay behavior.
